name: Super plane
description:
Controls : "W A S D"   or   "Z Q S D" to move,  "O" to shoot, "P" to bomb.

GameBoy game created during GB Jam 8.

Constrains to build a GameBoy game were :

-Display only 4 colors at screen at the same time.

-Respect GameBoy aspect-ratio : 160x144 px.

-Respect GameBoy controls
